name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_4b2bd701-fa60-40db-a856-a76a9be0c0be
text:
rule malicious_process_launch {
  meta:
    author = "Google SecOps Gemini"
    description = "Detect process launch events that have been blocked by the security system"
    severity = "High"
  events:
    $e.metadata.event_type = "PROCESS_LAUNCH"
    $e.security_result.action = "BLOCK"
  outcome:
    $event_type = $e.metadata.event_type
    $log_type = $e.metadata.log_type
    $action = array($e.security_result.action)
    $details = array($e.security_result.action_details)
    $summary = array($e.security_result.summary)
    $process_name = $e.target.process.file.full_path
    $principal_hostname = $e.principal.hostname
    $principal_user = $e.principal.user.userid
  condition:
    $e
}
author: Google SecOps Gemini

metadata.description: Detect process launch events that have been blocked by the security system
